Uses of Class
logic.Character

    • Uses of Character in logic

      Subclasses of Character in logic 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Drunken
      A type of Guard that can randomly fall asleep and invert the pre-determined path's direction when he wakes up
      class  Guard
      Guard, the first level's enemy
      class  Hero
      The game's main and playable character
      class  Ogre
      Ogre, the second game level's enemy
      class  Rookie
      A type of Guard that always follows the movement pattern with no exceptions
      class  Suspicious
      A type of Guard that randomly changes his movement's direction because he can't even trust his shadow
